column4: Hi can anyone help me on how to install drivers via the terminal?
there should be documentation with the drivers on what to do / how to use them
what command are you trying to do, and what error
what command does the docs tell you to run
you can make a directory where ever you want
then put the files in it
follow the instructions with the installer
what part is not working now
so if you do "sudo ./installer" what happens ?
then you need to get support from the people who make the driver
